title: Athletism — Skiing (Elite) — Phase 6: Reactive Plyometrics & Deceleration
equipment: Gym: squat rack, platforms, barbells, dumbbells, cables
Stationary bike/Wattbike, treadmill (incline), curved sprint track
goal: Improve braking strength & reacceleration; stiffness where needed.

warmup: Activation 8–10' (glute med, deep core, scapular control)
Landing mechanics: snap-downs, pogos, lateral snap-downs
main: Depth drops to stick 3x5 (30–45cm), then rebound hops 3x6
Lateral bounds 4x10/side with short ground contact
Sprint: 6x20m hill sprints (emphasis decel mechanics on return)

notes: Week 1: Depth drops 3x5 + lateral rebound hops 3x8. Week 2: Add reactive bounds 4x8/side.
